designProcess.title: ENQUIRY
designProcess.description: Initial contact and discussion to understand your design needs. Gather basic information about your brand and project requirements.

designProcess.title: DISCOVERY
designProcess.description: In-depth consultations to delve into your brand identity, values, and story. Identify unique elements that define your brand and set it apart.

designProcess.title: ONBOARDING
designProcess.description: Formalize collaboration, discussing project scope, timelines, and expectations. Establish a clear understanding of your vision and goals for the design project.

designProcess.title: DESIGN
designProcess.description: Conceptualization of design ideas based on the gathered information. Crafting design drafts that align with your brand's essence and objectives.

designProcess.title: SIGN OFF
designProcess.description: Collaborate on design drafts, incorporating your feedback. Finalize designs, ensuring they meet your expectations and brand standards.
